title: Jude the Obscure - Which happens at the end

content.question: Which of the following happens at the end of the passage?

choices.label: Jude’s attitude toward his work begins to change.
Jude starts to question his need for friends.
The rooks become discouraged and seek food elsewhere.
The rooks take on a suggestion of sinister foreboding.

content.answer: Jude’s attitude toward his work begins to change.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
